title: 11/25/21 DPS Hour 1
itunes:title: 11/25/21 DPS Hour 1
description:
Doug Gottlieb and TJ Houshmandzadeh guest hosting for Dan on a special Thanksgiving show. Doug and TJ discuss Lebron James and his return after serving a one-game suspension for his tussle with Pistons' Isaiah Stewart. They both agreed with what Lebron said about the incident, as they felt the suspension was unwarranted. TJ and Doug get into the Aaron Rodgers Toe ordeal, both just wondering how this will impact his play moving forward.

PFF's lead NFL analyst Sam Monson joins Doug and TJ to give his analysis of players and teams heading into week 12 of the season. TJ and Doug then give their thoughts on the Everson Griffen situation in Minnesota and how they think the team will move on from here.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
